flow.descriptionCdata:
7b9c672c-7132-4eda-837f-2545b222a740.072c4d81-892b-4696-b4a9-bb7619b0930f.description=Simplified inputs for adding disk to existing VM. It'll get the correct BUS and LUN instead of asking the user to specify. 7b9c672c-7132-4eda-837f-2545b222a740.2034fef1-2ec5-4a72-8dcc-3f0ff577bdef.description=Simplified inputs for adding disk to existing VM. It'll get the correct BUS and LUN instead of asking the user to specify. 7b9c672c-7132-4eda-837f-2545b222a740.2868e7a3-6a4f-4b15-bda7-d713f6bf41ca.description=
Checks if a number or word is less than another number or word. Word comparison is case-sensitive in alphabetical order.

Inputs\:
value1 - The first value.
value2 - The second value.

Returns\:
value1 < value2

Responses\:
success - The boolean operation was evaluated to true.
failure - Something went wrong or the boolean operation returned false.
7b9c672c-7132-4eda-837f-2545b222a740.3fa4f283-544d-4d7c-8912-8937a80ef0d6.description=
Multiplies two numbers

Inputs\:
value1 - The first value.
value2 - The second value.

Returns\:
The product of the two numbers.

Responses\:
success - The operation completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.
7b9c672c-7132-4eda-837f-2545b222a740.48cdbc69-4390-4eec-bb07-deb4b9ca4778.description=
Multiplies two numbers

Inputs\:
value1 - The first value.
value2 - The second value.

Returns\:
The product of the two numbers.

Responses\:
success - The operation completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.
7b9c672c-7132-4eda-837f-2545b222a740.52d6fa37-755d-45b1-bf21-ba3b2e7c2abd.description=This flow will format and mount initial and additional datadisks to virtual and physical servers. The inputs are\: server.os Mandatory - should contain 'win' in case of windows, and '2008' or '2012' to make a difference between those two isAdditional Mandatory - should be 'True' if the disk that is added is not the first initial datadisk, but an additional one lun.wwname Only required for additional Linux datadisks disk.filesystem Only required for Linux servers server.hostname Madatory disk.mountpoint Not used at the moment. Can be used later to specifiy a mountpoint. See memo in the flow. disk.size Mandatory for Windows (All servers), and for Linux virtual servers isVirtual Mandatory - should be 'True' if the server is a virtual server. False for physical servers 7b9c672c-7132-4eda-837f-2545b222a740.7aad7606-4a03-4c28-96f0-7bb29edffa54.description=Simplified inputs for adding disk to existing VM. It'll get the correct BUS and LUN instead of asking the user to specify. 7b9c672c-7132-4eda-837f-2545b222a740.818df032-1884-43ce-8c5e-29fd956e53ae.description=
Adds two numbers together

Inputs\:
value1 - The first value.
value2 - The second value.

Returns\:
The sum of the two numbers.

Responses\:
success - The operation completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.
7b9c672c-7132-4eda-837f-2545b222a740.9fbb5263-f141-463d-b57a-d97e672b736b.description=This flow will format and mount initial and additional datadisks to virtual and physical servers. The inputs are\: server.os Mandatory - should contain 'win' in case of windows, and '2008' or '2012' to make a difference between those two isAdditional Mandatory - should be 'True' if the disk that is added is not the first initial datadisk, but an additional one lun.wwname Only required for additional Linux datadisks disk.filesystem Only required for Linux servers server.hostname Madatory disk.mountpoint Not used at the moment. Can be used later to specifiy a mountpoint. See memo in the flow. disk.size Mandatory for Windows (All servers), and for Linux virtual servers isVirtual Mandatory - should be 'True' if the server is a virtual server. False for physical servers 7b9c672c-7132-4eda-837f-2545b222a740.b24fcf30-4752-4613-b68a-b5a42689850e.description=
Multiplies two numbers

Inputs\:
value1 - The first value.
value2 - The second value.

Returns\:
The product of the two numbers.

Responses\:
success - The operation completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.
7b9c672c-7132-4eda-837f-2545b222a740.b61a1ebe-ffb0-45cd-954a-9c0b41634067.description=
Adds two numbers together

Inputs\:
value1 - The first value.
value2 - The second value.

Returns\:
The sum of the two numbers.

Responses\:
success - The operation completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.
7b9c672c-7132-4eda-837f-2545b222a740.c0482805-9a21-46d4-b84c-1015b9046766.description=This flow will format and mount initial and additional datadisks to virtual and physical servers. The inputs are\: server.os Mandatory - should contain 'win' in case of windows, and '2008' or '2012' to make a difference between those two isAdditional Mandatory - should be 'True' if the disk that is added is not the first initial datadisk, but an additional one lun.wwname Only required for additional Linux datadisks disk.filesystem Only required for Linux servers server.hostname Madatory disk.mountpoint Not used at the moment. Can be used later to specifiy a mountpoint. See memo in the flow. disk.size Mandatory for Windows (All servers), and for Linux virtual servers isVirtual Mandatory - should be 'True' if the server is a virtual server. False for physical servers
flow.name: SQLServer_AddDataDisks
